oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dipolar and quadrupolar polarizabilities of C-60(-)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ions
hyperpolarizability
photodetachment
density
model
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The shell potential experienced by the last electron in C-60(-) is simulated by a delta-function potential. It allows us to deduce the polarizabilities of C-60(-) in an essentially analytic form, leading to polarizabilities alpha(1) = 1.231 x 10(3), alpha(2) 1.80 x 10(4), for C-60(-).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF PHYSICS B-ATOMIC MOLECULAR AND OPTICAL PHYSICS, 37(14), 3003-3009
